漢羅台文: 佮陳達老先生為啥物堅持用正確發音的苦心。
台羅: kah Tân Ta̍t lāu-sian-sinn uī-siánn-mih kian-tshî iōng tsìng-khak huat-im ê khóo-sim.
台羅數字調: kah4 tan5 tat8 lau7-sian1-sinn1 ui7-siann2-mih4 kian1-tshi5 iong7 tsing3-khak4 huat4-im1 e5 khoo2-sim1.
白話字: kah Tân Ta̍t lāu-sian-siⁿ ūi-siáⁿ-mih kian-chhî iōng chèng-khak hoat-im ê khó͘-sim.
